title: What are biggest problem women's face today's? - Motivation Hunter - Quora

response.answer_text: Women are like “devi” with full of energy and power. But women think they are weak in front of men's. And that's the mentality of a women.. Which run in their life. They have equal power, even more then boys but they does not realize that energy. They go through with the sacrifices and even GOD knows that girls have more power then boys thats why GOD gives more difficulties to live life as compared with boys What women's weakness is they think they are weak..
